entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 2:14 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
